Package com.designPatterns.Adapter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AdvancedMediaPlayer
    The AdvancedmediaPlayer declares two method for playing VLC and Mp4 content which accepts fileName as input parameters.
    MediaPlayer
    MediaPlayer interface with the play method accepting two parameters "AudioType" and "fileName".
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AudioPlayer
    The AudioPalyer Class implements the MediaPlayer Interface and defines the play method .This class plays mp3 by default and we need it to play other formats as well such as "VLC" and "mp4" To achieve this we keep an instance of MediaAdapter.
    MediaAdapter
    The MediaAdapter implements MediaPlayer and keep and instance of AdvancedMusicPlayer .The AdavancedMediaPlayer is capable of playing different contents such as mp4 and VLC content.
    Mp4Player
    Mp4Player class defines only playMp4 method as its sole responsibility is to play Mp4 content so we leave the playVlc method as it is.
    TestAdapterPattern
    TestAdapterPattern gets the user input and then executes the required methods of AudioPlayer to play different content types.
    VlcPlayer
    VlcPlayer plays the vlcMedia content through playVlc method and leaves the playMp4 method as it is.
